title: What is the importance of online teaching and learning? - Quora

response.answer_text: Online tutoring is a wonderful career option to continue your profession from home or a comfort zone and earning money. Qualified, experienced and computer savvy teachers, professionals, college students can all be a part of this profession. Compared to the 1 to 1, face to face and classroom tutoring, online tutoring has several advantages. Convenience: It’s flexible, the time, work schedule and location can be adjusted as per tutor’s and student’s mutual requirement. You can save time as you don’t need to travel and can do from your comfort zone.Cost effective: The infrastructural costs of arranging an online tutorial are minimal, tutors charge lower (not every time) per hour rates for online tuition in comparison to in-person sessions. Since you no longer have to travel for the tutorial, you save money. Therefore, in most cases online tutoring works out to be more cost effective than in-person tutoring.Remote access to experts: If you don’t find a suitable tutor tutor locally, you can go for an online tutor who can help you remotely (from any location of the world). There are several websites that provides online tutoring services. You can find tutors as per your required experience and qualification.Recording of online tutorials: One of the most important advantages of online tutoring is being able to replay the recorded sessions. Not only does it reinforce the learning, it can also be a novel way to do your revisions just before the exam, giving you a competitive edge over your peers. From tutors end, it also helps to regenerate revenue by recurring use of the recorded sessions.File sharing and using white board: You can receive or send any study materials, documents, presentation through online tutoring or eLearning. Using white board gives the better understanding of learning.Job opportunity: With out any mobility there are very much flexible job opportunities available. And you can do it as a part of a venture or individually.

Online learning has completely transformed the educational landscape. It has made learning open to all. So far, online learning has been effective enough in providing valuable education for lower costs. A majority of people believe that that online learning offers a plethora of new opportunities to students. Despite offering so many benefits, Online learning still faces criticism. People often think that students who get educated through online learning are not as smart as college or university students. This causes a sense of disagreement in many people from taking online courses. However, in a highly competitive world, online learning helps people to get the right skills and broaden their horizons while overcoming time and monetary hindrances.
